channel.title: Homes on Sylvain Le Corff
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Sylvain Le Corff

item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes :rocket: Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Ph.D. degree in Statistics from Telecom ParisTech in 2012 under the supervision of Eric Moulines (Ecole Polytechnique) and Gersende Fort (Institut de Mathematiques de Toulouse). Research Fellow in the University of Warwick (CRiSM) in 2012 under the supervision of Gareth O. Roberts and Krzysztof Latuszynski. CNRS Associate Scientist in 2013 in University Paris-Sud (Institut de Mathematique d'Orsay) - on leave since September 2018. September 2018 – … Professor of Statistics.

item.title: Research activities
item.description: Current Ph.D. students Alice Martin (Telecom SudParis & Ecole Polytechnique, Apr. 2019 - …) Co-supervised with Olivier Pietquin (Google Brain) Deep reinforcement learning for natural language processing. Application to goal-oriented visual question generation Max Cohen (Telecom SudParis & Oze Energies, Feb. 2020 - …) Co-supervised with Marius Preda (Telecom SudParis) Metamodels and Bayesian deep learning for partially observed dynamical systems Yazid El Janati (Telecom SudParis, Oct. 2020 - …)

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Lecture notes Introduction to Markov chains and Markov chain Monte Carlo methods. Ms. Sc. Data Sciences (2nd year / M2) @Institut Polytechnique de Paris Introduction to machine learning. Ms. Eng. (2nd year) @Institut Polytechnique de Paris Dimension reduction, supervised classification, multilinear regression, gradient based optimization… Bayesian inference for partially observed dynamical systems Ms. Sc. Data Sciences (2nd year / M2) @Institut Polytechnique de Paris Markov chains Exercises Maximum likelihood estimation for Markov chains Exercises

item.title: Talks
item.description: Invitations MHC2020 - Mixtures, Hidden Markov Models and Clustering Workshop, Institut de mathematique d’Orsay, France (06-20) Data Science and Finance conference, Siem Reap, Cambodia (03-19) Masterclass in Bayesian statistics, CIRM, Marseille, France (10-18) Advances in Finite Mixture and Other Non-regular Models, Guilin, Guangxi, China (08-18) International conference on Monte Carlo techniques, Paris, France (07-16) NIPS Workshop Advances in Variational Inference, Montreal, Canada (12-14) Rencontres statistiques de Rochebrune, Rochebrune, France (04-14)
